title: The Drag
creator_credit: Carlos Marchiori, Robert Verrall, Wolf Koenig and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Animated cartoon about a young man who becomes a chain smoker. Explains to young people the psychology of the smoking habit, including the part played by cigarette advertising.
